mapper.select: select count(scheduling.id) as number,category.name as attribute from tbl_vehicle_category as category left join tbl_vehicle_scheduling as scheduling on (category.id = scheduling.vehicle_category_id and NOW() > scheduling.end_time and end_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} ) where category.delete_time is null and scheduling.delete_time is null GROUP BY category.name order by number desc

select @rowno:=@rowno+1 as top,rate.car_number as attribute,rate.number as number from ( select @rowno:=0, car_number ,${field} as number from tbl_vehicle_info where delete_time is null order by ${field} desc ) as rate
select * from tbl_vehicle_info where delete_time is null and car_number like concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
